item.title: Random letter and # gen
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]program New;

var
i: Integer;
theRandomStuff: string;

const
theString= ‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz’;

function randomNumber: integer;
begin
result:= random(10);
end;

function randomLetter: string;
begin
result:= copy(theString, random(25), 1);
end;

begin
for i:= 1 to random(20) + 5 do
case random(2) of
0: theRandomStuff:= theRandomStuff + inttostr(randomNumber);
1: theRandomStuff:= theRandomStuff + randomLetter;
end;
writeln(theRandomStuff);
end.[/scar]

There you go. Though, please don’t post this in two sections next time

Read full topic
